product_name: CHANELDEMAQUILLANT YEUX INTENSE Gentle Bi-Phase Eye Makeup Remover
summary: SummaryA dual-phase eye makeup remover that gently whisks away all makeup, leaving a refreshing feel and no oily film. Eyelids are soft and supple, and lashes are protected.
details: DetailsFeaturesCornflower extract and rose extract help soothe and calm the vulnerable eye area.Purified oils work to remove all makeup, even waterproof mascara.Item 2607864How To UseShake bottle to combine the phases and lightly moisten a cotton pad. Apply the pad to lids and lashes and leave for a few seconds, then wipe off eye makeup. Rinse well.IngredientsAqua (Water), Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Octyldodecanol, Centaurea Cyanus Flower Water, Salicornia Herbacea Extract, Capryloyl Glycine, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Pentylene Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Potassium Sorbate, Maris Aqua (Sea Water), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Propylene Glycol, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Phormidium Persicinum Extract, CI 42090 (Blue 1), BS000037A.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Shake bottle to combine the phases and lightly moisten a cotton pad. Apply the pad to lids and lashes and leave for a few seconds, then wipe off eye makeup. Rinse well.

reviews.headline: Chanel
reviews.comments: Really great product! I used a very stubborn mascara and THIS took it right off! Love this proudct! Will definitely be a repurchase.

reviews.headline: Why the low ratings??
reviews.comments: I have used many, many makeup removers for eyes. This one is fabulous! Melts eye makeup, strip lash glue, long wear liner and lipstick so easily. Its gentle on the eyes. I even use it to clean my lashes! Its Chanel, so its a higher price point. But worth every penny!

reviews.headline: caused burns under eyes
reviews.comments: i regularly used this eye makeup remover for the last two years. i loved it, it was effective and gentle and removed water proof mascara seamlessly. most recently, i purchased a bottle in January and this reformulation has caused a reaction similar to burns under my eyes. The skin under my lashline down the the tear troughs is red, raw and irritated. I cannot believe how something so simple could create such a reaction on me! never have i had a product do something like this

reviews.headline: Fave eye makeup remover
reviews.comments: I love this makeup remover. It is pricey for what it is but it works well and is moistuizing.

reviews.headline: Formula changed
reviews.comments: This was my all-time fav eye makeup remover, but the last bottle I purchased wasn't the same. The formula seems more oily and yes - its making my vision blurry also! I have to rinse my eyes after using. Disappointed to see it appears to have had a forumla change. I will go back to Clinique

reviews.headline: Used to be great - Horrible new formula
reviews.comments: This used to be my go to eye makeup remover. I purchased a new one in September and have used it a few times since, and like another person my eyes were blurry after using it. Terrible new formula. Slowly losing a loyal Chanel customer.

reviews.headline: Not worth the price
reviews.comments: I was using Clinique but decided to try this one. I had to use remover with Chanel than Clinique. My eyes are blurry after using it and the skin around my eyes were very oily. I am disappointed with this product.

reviews.headline: Worth the price.  Delivers results FAST AND EASY
reviews.comments: There is no other eye makeup remover better than Chanel's.  I have worn every brand of mascara in print work modeling and in the many hats I wear in the entertainment industry.  I'm 49 and have worn mascara since I was 9.  Try Chanel's mascara too.

reviews.headline: Best mascara remover I have ever used
reviews.comments: I have used a lot of mascara modeling and performing on stage.  You will no longer need to look elsewhere because this is the best one that provides remarkable results.  It is pricey compared to other, but you want rub your eyes senseless if using any other brand.  I will never use anything else unless Chanel provides another one.
